channel.title: Cant connect to my server
channel.description: okay so i used to have my own private server, i shut it down. then i upgraded my computer to windows 7 ultimate. i decided to make another server the other day, so i coded a source a little bit, forwarded my ports, opened no-ip and got everything running. but when i try to log in by connecting to the local host of 127.0.0.1 it wont let me. i tried putting in the no-ip address and it still wont let me. and then i tried my actual ip and it still wont let me. it seems like something in windows is block me from connecting and i opened ports 43594 in my windows firewall on tcp/udp. if you guys think you might know a solution to the problem please let me know asap!

item.title: Cant connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @selohs selohs
item.description:
@selohs wrote:

im using dannyscape v4 317, and ive tried to even make a server using moparscape v3.2 w/ aryan and i still cant log in.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

you have changed you client connect adress to 127.0.0.1 because all others wont work. asuming you have then maybe you have ot cahnge somthing onside the source post the source name and type please? e.g pi/317

Read full topic

item.title: Cant connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @selohs selohs
item.description:
@selohs wrote:

okay so i used to have my own private server, i shut it down. then i upgraded my computer to windows 7 ultimate. i decided to make another server the other day, so i coded a source a little bit, forwarded my ports, opened no-ip and got everything running. but when i try to log in by connecting to the local host of 127.0.0.1 it wont let me. i tried putting in the no-ip address and it still wont let me. and then i tried my actual ip and it still wont let me. it seems like something in windows is block me from connecting and i opened ports 43594 in my windows firewall on tcp/udp. if you guys think you might know a solution to the problem please let me know asap!
